verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: cajun corn] my husband loves corn on the cob and i love this slow cooker recipe because i do n't have to stand at a hot stove we like a little spice so the cajun seasoning works well for us but any spice blend works —audra rorick scott city kansas
